verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
People come together, strange as neighbours our blood is one
Children of generations of every nation of kingdom come

verse.name: c1
verse.lines:
Don't let your heart be troubled, Hold your head up high
Don't fear no evil, Fix your eyes on this one truth;
God is madly in love with you, So take courage
Hold on, Be strong, Remember where our help comes from

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
Interlude:
Whoa oh! Whoa oh oh... Whoa oh oh...oh-oh-oh-oh-oh...
Whoa oh! Whoa oh oh... Whoa oh oh...oh-oh-oh-oh-oh...

verse.name: v3
verse.lines:
Jesus, our redemption, our salvation, is in His blood
Jesus, Light of heaven, Friend forever, His kingdom come

verse.name: b1
verse.lines:
Swing wide all you heavens, Let the praise go up, as the walls come down
All creation, everything with breath repeat the sound.
All His children, clean hands, pure hearts, good grace, good God
His Name is Jesus

verse.name: v4
verse.lines:
Jesus, our redemption, our salvation, is in His blood
Jesus, Light of heaven, Friend forever, His kingdom come
